subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Three weeks before the season-opening Daytona 500, Nascar driver Tony Stewart injured his back. He is retiring at the end of this season.
snippet: Three weeks before the season-opening Daytona 500, Nascar driver Tony Stewart injured his back. He is retiring at the end of this season.
